Debug_Armor_D_Chest_Of_Damage_Reduction.name: Debug Leather Cuirass of Damage Reduction

Debug_Armor_D_Head_Of_Dash_Reduction.name: Debug Leather Helm of Dash Cost Reduction

Debug_Armor_D_Legs_Of_Knockback_Reductio.name: Debug Leather Pants of Knockback Reduction

Debug_Armor_O_Chest_Of_Damage_Enhancemen.name: Debug Steel Cuirass of Damage Enhancement

Debug_Armor_O_Head_Of_Dash_Exhaustion.name: Debug Steel Helm of Dash Cost Increase

Debug_Armor_O_Legs_Of_Knockback_Enhancem.name: Debug Steel Greaves Of Knockback Enhancements

Bench_Alchemy.name: Alchemist's Workbench
Bench_Alchemy.description: Used to create potions and elixirs.\n\nThe alchemists of old long sought the secrets to eternal life. Some might say they achieved that grand goal, though perhaps not in the form they imagined.

Bench_Arcane.name: Arcanist's Workbench
Bench_Arcane.description: Used to fashion various arcane implements.\n\nThe arcane arts are the closest mere mortals have ever come to achieving Avatar powers. Had they mastered them sooner, perhaps they would not have been so easily swayed.

Bench_Armory.name: Forge
Bench_Armory.description: The heart of any workshop. Used to forge advanced armor and weapons.

Bench_Builders.name: Builder's Workbench
Bench_Builders.description: Used to create structural building blocks.

Bench_Campfire.name: Campfire
Bench_Campfire.description: Cook basic meals.\n\nTo many an adventurer, the humble campfire is all it takes to declare a place "home." Unshakeable bonds can be forged while basking in its warmth and all great tales have sparked from its embers.

Bench_Cooking.name: Chef's Stove
Bench_Cooking.description: A built-in kitchen that can be used to make advanced dishes.

Bench_Farming.name: Farmer's Workbench
Bench_Farming.description: Used to craft farming accessories and animal feed.

Bench_Furnace.name: Furnace
Bench_Furnace.description: Used to process ore into metal bars. Upgrading reduces smelting times and increases storage capacity.

Bench_Furniture.name: Furniture Workbench
Bench_Furniture.description: Used to craft furniture, storage, and decorative items to personalize your home.

Bench_Loom.name: Loom
Bench_Loom.description: Used to process cloth and magical items into materials.

Bench_Memories.name: The Heart of Orbis
Bench_Memories.description: A faint disembodied voice can be heard in the presence of this statue. Echoes of a being from beyond the barriers. From the original world.

Bench_Salvage.name: Salvager's Workbench
Bench_Salvage.description: [TMP] Can be used to break down some items into base materials.

Bench_Tannery.name: Tanning Rack
Bench_Tannery.description: Used to process raw hides into leather. Upgrading reduces processing times and increases storage capacity.

Bench_Trough.name: Trough - Feeding Bench
Bench_Trough.description: Used to craft farming accessories and animal feed.

Bench_WorkBench.name: Workbench
Bench_WorkBench.description: A workstation enabling the crafting of more complex tools and items.\n\nNo artisan is born a creator. Even Avatars need time to hone their craft, particularly when bound by the rules of another's domain.

Filter_Soils.name: Filter - Soils
Filter_Soils.description: Filter for dirt and grass terrain.

Filter_TreeWoodAndLeaves.name: Filter - Tree Wood & Leaves
Filter_TreeWoodAndLeaves.description: Filter for both tree wood and leaves

Container_Bucket.name: Wooden Bucket
Container_Bucket.description: [TMP] Can be filled with <color is="#ffffff">Water</color> or used to milk <color is="#ffffff">Cows</color>.

Coop_Chicken.name: Chicken Coop
Coop_Chicken.description: Chickens captured in a <item is="Tool_Capture_Crate"/> can be housed here.

Deco_Bucket.name: Ancient Bucket
Deco_Bucket.description: [TMP] Can be filled with <color is="#ffffff">Water</color> or used to milk <color is="#ffffff">Cows</color>.

Deco_Trophy_Harvest.name: Harvest Trophy
Deco_Trophy_Harvest.description: An artifact of immeasurable value - at least, to those who see it that way. Its form reflects the favor of Orbis' Avatar.

EditorTool_Entity.name: Entity Grabber Tool
EditorTool_Entity.description: Allows you to move and edit entities in the world.

EditorTool_Extrude.name: Extrude Brush Tool
EditorTool_Extrude.description: Allows you to extrude a coplanar surface to a variable depth.

EditorTool_Flood.name: Flood Brush Tool
EditorTool_Flood.description: A replacement brush that extends through neighboring blocks of the same type

EditorTool_Hitbox.name: Hitbox Tool
EditorTool_Hitbox.description: Allows you edit the hitbox data of any block in the world

EditorTool_LaserPointer.name: Laser Pointer
EditorTool_LaserPointer.description: Point at things with a visible laser beam that all players can see. Hold right-click to display the laser.

EditorTool_Layers.name: Layer Brush Tool
EditorTool_Layers.description: Allows you to replace existing blocks with layers of different materials

EditorTool_Line.name: Line Brush Tool
EditorTool_Line.description: Allows you to create line segments between two or more points

EditorTool_Machinima.name: Machinima Tool
EditorTool_Machinima.description: Allows you to create and edit in-game Machinima Animations using keyframed cameras, entities, players, particles, and more!

EditorTool_Noise.name: Noise Brush Tool
EditorTool_Noise.description: Allows you to easily create a random block noise pattern

EditorTool_Paint.name: Paint Brush Tool
EditorTool_Paint.description: An all-purpose brush tool that lets you use different materials and shapes to edit blocks

EditorTool_Paste.name: Paste Tool
EditorTool_Paste.description: Allows you to paste a previously copied or saved block selection

EditorTool_PrefabEditing_SelectPrefab.name: Prefab Selector Tool
EditorTool_PrefabEditing_SelectPrefab.description: (Prefab Editor Only) Allows you to select entire prefabs when inside a prefab editor instance

EditorTool_PrefabEditing_SetAnchor.name: Set Anchor Tool
EditorTool_PrefabEditing_SetAnchor.description: (Prefab Editor Only) Allows you to set the anchor point of a prefab when in a prefab editor instance

EditorTool_Ruler.name: Ruler Tool
EditorTool_Ruler.description: Allows you to create line segments between two or more points

EditorTool_Scatter.name: Scatter Brush Tool
EditorTool_Scatter.description: Allows you to randomly scatter blocks by specifying a density scale

EditorTool_Sculpt.name: Sculpt Brush Tool
EditorTool_Sculpt.description: A multipurpose tool for lifting, melting, and smoothing blocks

EditorTool_Selection.name: Selection Tool
EditorTool_Selection.description: Allows you to create and manipulate a selection box

EditorTool_Smooth.name: Smooth Brush Tool
EditorTool_Smooth.description: Allows you to softly blend and smooth rough terrain

EditorTool_Tint.name: Tint Brush Tool
EditorTool_Tint.description: Allows you to modify the color of tint used in a block column

EditorTool_Boulder.name: Boulder Brush
EditorTool_Boulder.description: Creates boulders when you use it

EditorTool_Building.name: Building Brush
EditorTool_Building.description: Creates buildings when you use it

EditorTool_Cracks.name: Lava Cracks Brush
EditorTool_Cracks.description: Creates Lava Cracks in the ground when you use it

EditorTool_Forest.name: Forest Brush
EditorTool_Forest.description: Creates forests when you use it

EditorTool_Grass.name: Grass Brush
EditorTool_Grass.description: Allows the user to paint grass onto the terrain

EditorTool_GrassPath.name: Grass Path Brush
EditorTool_GrassPath.description: Allows the user to paint grass paths onto the terrain

EditorTool_Hotsprings.name: Hotsprings Brush
EditorTool_Hotsprings.description: Allows the user to paint hotspring baths onto the terrain

EditorTool_Mountain.name: Mountain Brush
EditorTool_Mountain.description: Raises a mountain wherever you use it

EditorTool_Path.name: Path Brush
EditorTool_Path.description: Creates paths on the ground when you use it

EditorTool_River.name: River Brush
EditorTool_River.description: Creates Rivers in the ground when you use it

EditorTool_Rubble.name: Rubble Brush
EditorTool_Rubble.description: Allows the user to paint rubbled areas onto the terrain

EditorTool_RuinRoofs.name: Ruins Brush
EditorTool_RuinRoofs.description: Allows the user to paint ruins onto the terrain

EditorTool_Ruins.name: Ruins Brush
EditorTool_Ruins.description: Generates unique ruined buildings depending on shape and size

EditorTool_Spiral.name: Spiral Brush
EditorTool_Spiral.description: Creates spirals when you use it

EditorTool_Tentacle.name: Tentacle Brush
EditorTool_Tentacle.description: Allows the user to paint tentacles onto the terrain

EditorTool_ExampleToolArg.name: Scripted Brush Example: Tool Argument
EditorTool_ExampleToolArg.description: Demonstrates the JumpIfToolArg operation with checkbox and dropdown arguments

Teleporter.name: Teleporter
Teleporter.description: Connects to another teleporter. Place two to create a warp link.

Food_Fish_Grilled.name: Grilled Fish
Food_Fish_Grilled.description:
[TMP] Instantly restores <color is="#ffffff">5%</color> health and grants:

 <color is="#ffffff">Health Regen I</color>
 <color is="#ffffff">Health Boost I</color>

Duration: <color is="#ffffff">0:45</color>

Food_Kebab_Fruit.description:
[TMP] Instantly restores <color is="#ffffff">10%</color> health and grants:

 <color is="#ffffff">Health Regen II</color>
 <color is="#ffffff">Stamina Boost II</color>

Duration: <color is="#ffffff">2:30</color>

Food_Wildmeat_Cooked.description:

Furniture_Crude_Bed.name: Crude Bedroll
Furniture_Crude_Bed.description: When placed, allows an Avatar to set their respawn point to this location.

Furniture_Crude_Torch.name: Crude Torch
Furniture_Crude_Torch.description: For the last peoples of Orbis, fire was both a source of creativity that elevated their civilization to new heights, and the force that would ultimately lead to their undoing.

Furniture_Temple_Dark_Statue.name: Statue of The Watcher
Furniture_Temple_Dark_Statue.description: The whispers were not what compelled the Outlanders to settle in these colder lands. Yet it remains an unquestionable fact that when they arrived, the whispers were already there.

Furniture_Temple_Scarak_Statue.name: Statue of the Founding Builder
Furniture_Temple_Scarak_Statue.description: Long since forgotten by the fallen Scaraks, some few statues of the Founding Builder still stand in their oldest ruins. The few explorers who have since stumbled upon them speak only of an emanating sense of disappointment and disapproval - as if the stone itself was stained by its silent witness of the atrocities committed under the first and last Scarak Empress.

Ingredient_Bone_Fragment.name: Bone Fragments
Ingredient_Bone_Fragment.description: Orbis' most advanced civilizations shared a common trait - the hubris that ultimately led to their downfall. These bone fragments - and the cursed creature from which they were salvaged - should serve as a reminder that some paths are better left untrodden.

Ingredient_Chitin_Sturdy.name: Sturdy Chitin
Ingredient_Chitin_Sturdy.description: This resilient material forms the exoskeletons of many creatures found throughout the lands.

Ingredient_Fire_Essence.name: Essence of Fire
Ingredient_Fire_Essence.description: This energy once gave form to the dreams of Crucible's artisans. Today it merely lingers in the creatures that dwell amid the desolated volcanic regions.

Ingredient_Ice_Essence.name: Essence of Ice
Ingredient_Ice_Essence.description: When the Outlanders rejected the flame and split from their brethren, they turned instead toward the colder regions and the fragile strength found in the advancing sheets of ice.

Ingredient_Life_Essence.name: Essence of Life
Ingredient_Life_Essence.description: A form of overflowing life energy found in abundance around plant life on Orbis. In great enough concentrations, perhaps it could even bring forth sentience where it was absent before.

Ingredient_Life_Essence_Concentrated.name: Greater Essence of Life
Ingredient_Life_Essence_Concentrated.description: An amalgamation equivalent to <color is="#3e9049">100 Essences of Life</color>.

Ingredient_Lightning_Essence.name: Essence of Lightning
Ingredient_Lightning_Essence.description: Raging storms have proved attractive to many creatures over the centuries. Though the true source of such magic is nowhere to be found, the elementals born from its lingering traces still wander the lands.

Ingredient_Sac_Venom.name: Venom Sac
Ingredient_Sac_Venom.description: Orbis is home to poisonous creatures of all shapes and sizes. Antidotes distilled from their venom by the Ferans were once prized across the lands.

Ingredient_Voidheart.name: Voidheart
Ingredient_Voidheart.description: The still-beating heart of a greater denizen of the Void.\n\nNot all creatures are born of the Void, yet even those taken and corrupted may bear this same shriveled heart.

Ingredient_Void_Essence.name: Essence of the Void
Ingredient_Void_Essence.description: It's unclear whether creatures of the Void produce this essence, or if its presence is required to sustain their existence. What can be said for certain is that the two are inextricably bound.

Ingredient_Water_Essence.name: Essence of Water
Ingredient_Water_Essence.description: Even fish have a natural affinity for magic. As water filters through their gills, the concentration grows. Perhaps therein lies the secret to the abyssal creatures lurking in Orbis' darkest depths.

Ingredient_Fabric_Scrap_Cindercloth.name: Cindercloth Scraps
Ingredient_Fabric_Scrap_Cindercloth.description: When the cursed flame scoured Crucible it left nothing unchanged. Even these scraps of fabric - salvaged from the charred bones of a former denizen - continue to emit an uncanny heat.

Ingredient_Fabric_Scrap_Linen.name: Linen Scraps
Ingredient_Fabric_Scrap_Linen.description: Scraps of a common fabric used by many of Orbis' species to fashion their clothing.

Ingredient_Fabric_Scrap_Shadoweave.name: Shadoweave Scraps
Ingredient_Fabric_Scrap_Shadoweave.description: This heavy fabric, imbued with a quiet brooding darkness, was devised by the Outlanders prior to their first communion with the Void. Though still a core component of their garb, the secret of its making has long since been lost.

Ingredient_Hide_Dark.name: Dark Hide
Ingredient_Hide_Dark.description: [TMP] Can be processed into <item is="Ingredient_Leather_Dark"/> at a <item is="Bench_Tannery"/>.

Ingredient_Hide_Heavy.name: Heavy Hide
Ingredient_Hide_Heavy.description: [TMP] Can be processed into <item is="Ingredient_Leather_Heavy"/> at a <item is="Bench_Tannery"/>.

Ingredient_Hide_Light.name: Light Hide
Ingredient_Hide_Light.description: [TMP] Can be processed into <item is="Ingredient_Leather_Light"/> at a <item is="Bench_Tannery"/>.

Ingredient_Hide_Medium.name: Medium Hide
Ingredient_Hide_Medium.description: [TMP] Can be processed into <item is="Ingredient_Leather_Medium"/> at a <item is="Bench_Tannery"/>.

Ingredient_Hide_Prismic.name: Prismatic Hide
Ingredient_Hide_Prismic.description: [TMP] Can be processed into <item is="Ingredient_Leather_Prismic"/> at a <item is="Bench_Tannery"/>.

Ingredient_Hide_Scaled.name: Scaled Hide
Ingredient_Hide_Scaled.description: [TMP] Can be processed into <item is="Ingredient_Leather_Scaled"/> at a <item is="Bench_Tannery"/>.

Ingredient_Hide_Soft.name: Soft Hide
Ingredient_Hide_Soft.description: [TMP] Can be processed into <item is="Ingredient_Leather_Soft"/> at a <item is="Bench_Tannery"/>.

Ingredient_Hide_Storm.name: Storm Hide
Ingredient_Hide_Storm.description: [TMP] Can be processed into <item is="Ingredient_Leather_Storm"/> at a <item is="Bench_Tannery"/>.

Ingredient_Life_Essence_100.name: Essence of Life
Ingredient_Life_Essence_100.description: A form of overflowing life energy found in abundance around plant life on Orbis. In great enough concentrations, perhaps it could even bring forth sentience where it was absent before.

Ingredient_Life_Essence_Aubergine.name: Essence of Life
Ingredient_Life_Essence_Aubergine.description: A form of overflowing life energy found in abundance around plant life on Orbis. In great enough concentrations, perhaps it could even bring forth sentience where it was absent before.

Ingredient_Life_Essence_Pumpkin.description: A form of overflowing life energy found in abundance around plant life on Orbis. In great enough concentrations, perhaps it could even bring forth sentience where it was absent before.

Ingredient_Life_Essence_Tomato.description: A form of overflowing life energy found in abundance around plant life on Orbis. In great enough concentrations, perhaps it could even bring forth sentience where it was absent before.

Ingredient_Life_Essence_Turnip.description: A form of overflowing life energy found in abundance around plant life on Orbis. In great enough concentrations, perhaps it could even bring forth sentience where it was absent before.

Ingredient_Life_Essence_Wheat.description: A form of overflowing life energy found in abundance around plant life on Orbis. In great enough concentrations, perhaps it could even bring forth sentience where it was absent before.

Bandage_Crude.name: Bandage
Bandage_Crude.description: Use to quickly regain health.\n\nThough rudimentary, this type of bandage was favored by the knights of a lost civilization for the ease with which they could be fashioned from common materials on the battlefield.

Ore_Adamantite.name: Adamantite Ore
Ore_Adamantite.description: [TMP] Can be smelted into an <item is="Ingredient_Bar_Adamantite"/> at a <item is="Bench_Furnace"/>.

Ore_Cobalt.name: Cobalt Ore
Ore_Cobalt.description: [TMP] Can be smelted into a <item is="Ingredient_Bar_Cobalt"/> at a <item is="Bench_Furnace"/>.

Ore_Copper.name: Copper Ore
Ore_Copper.description: [TMP] Can be smelted into a <item is="Ingredient_Bar_Copper"/> at a <item is="Bench_Furnace"/>.

Ore_Mithril.name: Mithril Ore
Ore_Mithril.description: [TMP] Can be smelted into a <item is="Ingredient_Bar_Mithril"/> at a <item is="Bench_Furnace"/>.

Ore_Onyxium.name: Onyxium Ore
Ore_Onyxium.description: [TMP] Can be smelted into an <item is="Ingredient_Bar_Onyxium"/> at a <item is="Bench_Furnace"/>.

Ore_Prisma.description: [TMP] Can be smelted into a <item is="Ingredient_Bar_Prisma"/> at a <item is="Bench_Furnace"/>.

Plant_Sapling_Apple.name: Apple Sapling
Plant_Sapling_Apple.description:
[TMP] Grows into an <color is="#ffffff">Apple Tree</color>.
 Yields <color is="#ffffff">Hardwood</color>
 Grows <color is="#4ade80">8</color> <color is="#ffffff">Apples</color>
 Apples regrow every <color is="#4ade80">12</color> <color is="#ffffff">Hours</color>

Growth Time:
 <color is="#4ade80">5</color> <color is="#ffffff">Stages</color>
 <color is="#4ade80">5</color> <color is="#ffffff">Days</color>

Plant_Sapling_Ash.name: Ash Sapling
Plant_Sapling_Ash.description:
[TMP] Grows into an <color is="#ffffff">Ash Tree</color>.
 Yields <color is="#ffffff">Hardwood</color>

Growth Time:
 <color is="#4ade80">5</color> <color is="#ffffff">Stages</color>
 <color is="#4ade80">2</color> <color is="#ffffff">Days</color>

Plant_Sapling_Beech.name: Beech Sapling
Plant_Sapling_Beech.description:
[TMP] Grows into a <color is="#ffffff">Beech Tree</color>.
 Yields <color is="#ffffff">Softwood</color>

Growth Time:
 <color is="#4ade80">5</color> <color is="#ffffff">Stages</color>
 <color is="#4ade80">2</color> <color is="#ffffff">Days</color>

Plant_Sapling_Birch.name: Birch Sapling
Plant_Sapling_Birch.description:
[TMP] Grows into a <color is="#ffffff">Birch Tree</color>.
 Yields <color is="#ffffff">Lightwood</color>

Growth Time:
 <color is="#4ade80">5</color> <color is="#ffffff">Stages</color>
 <color is="#4ade80">2</color> <color is="#ffffff">Days</color>

Plant_Sapling_Cedar.name: Cedar Sapling
Plant_Sapling_Cedar.description:
[TMP] Grows into a <color is="#ffffff">Cedar Tree</color>.
 Yields <color is="#ffffff">Darkwood</color>

Growth Time:
 <color is="#4ade80">5</color> <color is="#ffffff">Stages</color>
 <color is="#4ade80">2</color> <color is="#ffffff">Days</color>

Plant_Sapling_Crystal.name: Crystal Sapling
Plant_Sapling_Crystal.description:
[TMP] Grows into a <color is="#ffffff">Crystal Tree</color>.
 Yields <color is="#ffffff">Wood</color>

Growth Time:
 <color is="#4ade80">5</color> <color is="#ffffff">Stages</color>
 <color is="#4ade80">2</color> <color is="#ffffff">Days</color>

Plant_Sapling_Dry.description:

Growth Time:

 <color is="#4ade80">2</color> <color is="#ffffff">Days</color>

Growth Time:

Duration: <color is="#ffffff">0:45</color>

Growth Time:

 <color is="#ffffff">Regrows</color>

Hub_Portal_Default.name: Exploration Worldgen Portal
Hub_Portal_Default.description: Portal that teleports you to Exploration Worldgen, used in the Creative Hub

Hub_Portal_Flat.name: Flat Worldgen Portal
Hub_Portal_Flat.description: Portal that teleports you to Flat Worldgen, used in the Creative Hub

Instance_Gateway.name: Instance Gateway
Instance_Gateway.description: A gateway that allows you to travel to different instances. Interact with it to configure the destination.

PortalKey_Hederas_Lair.name: Fragment: Orbis - The Dread Wade
PortalKey_Hederas_Lair.description: \n\nFew have experienced the terrors that lurk in Orbis' murkier depths.

PortalKey_Henges.name: Fragment: Orbis - Silent Henges
PortalKey_Henges.description: \n\nMysterious henges tower over a frozen land.

PortalKey_Jungles.name: Fragment: Orbis - Tal'Kesi Refuge
PortalKey_Jungles.description: \n\nDeep beneath the desolate wastelands left by an ancient civilization, a primordial haven thrives.

PortalKey_Taiga.name: Fragment: Orbis - Dragonspire Weald
PortalKey_Taiga.description: \n\nThere are frozen forests into which not even an Outlander dares set foot, no matter how the whispers beckon.

PortalKey_Windsurf_Valley.name: Fragment: Orbis - Windrider Valley
PortalKey_Windsurf_Valley.description: \n\nA Feran values freedom above all else, and nowhere is that freedom embodied more than in the winds of Windrider Valley.

Portal_Device.name: Ancient Gateway
Portal_Device.description: Place this in your base to tear down the barriers and travel to other Fragments! Work In Progress. Though the curse keeps Gaia's Orbis locked away, there are ways to pierce the Void that veils it.

Portal_Return.name: Return Portal
Portal_Return.description: This is your way out of a Fragment!

VoidInvasion_Portal.name: Void Invasion Portal
VoidInvasion_Portal.description: Utility block for void invasions within Fragments.

Forgotten_Temple_Portal_Enter.name: Forgotten Temple Gateway
Forgotten_Temple_Portal_Enter.description: Use to enter the Forgotten Temple.

Potion_Antidote.name: Antidote
Potion_Antidote.description: Cures poison and grants temporary immunity.

Potion_Empty.name: Empty Potion Bottle
Potion_Empty.description: Can be acquired by smelting sand in a <item is="Bench_Furnace"/>.

Potion_Health_Greater.name: [TMP] Greater Health Potion
Potion_Health_Greater.description: [TMP] Restores 25% health instantly and another 50% after 5 seconds. Effect is removed when taking damage.

Potion_Health_Lesser.name: [TMP] Lesser Health Potion
Potion_Health_Lesser.description: [TMP] Restores 15% health instantly and another 30% after 5 seconds. Effect is removed when taking damage.

Potion_Signature_Greater.name: [TMP] Greater Energy Potion
Potion_Signature_Greater.description: [TMP] Generates 80% weapon signature energy over 30 seconds.

Potion_Signature_Lesser.name: [TMP] Lesser Energy Potion
Potion_Signature_Lesser.description: [TMP] Generates 40% weapon signature energy over 30 seconds.

Recipe_Food_Pie_Apple.name: [TMP] Recipe: Apple Pie
Recipe_Food_Pie_Apple.description:
[TMP] Teaches the <item is="Food_Pie_Apple"/> recipe.

Instantly restores <color is="#ffffff">15%</color> health and grants:

 <color is="#ffffff">Health Regen III</color>
 <color is="#ffffff">Stamina Boost III</color>

Duration: <color is="#ffffff">6:00</color>

Recipe_Food_Pie_Meat.name: [TMP] Recipe: Meat Pie
Recipe_Food_Pie_Meat.description:
[TMP] Teaches the <item is="Food_Pie_Meat"/> recipe.

Instantly restores <color is="#ffffff">15%</color> health and grants:

 <color is="#ffffff">Health Regen III</color>
 <color is="#ffffff">Health Boost III</color>

Duration: <color is="#ffffff">6:00</color>

Recipe_Food_Pie_Pumpkin.name: [TMP] Recipe: Pumpkin Pie
Recipe_Food_Pie_Pumpkin.description:
[TMP] Teaches the <item is="Food_Pie_Pumpkin"/> recipe.

Instantly restores <color is="#ffffff">15%</color> health and grants:

 <color is="#ffffff">Health Regen III</color>
 <color is="#ffffff">Stamina Boost III</color>

Duration: <color is="#ffffff">6:00</color>

Recipe_Food_Salad_Caesar.name: [TMP] Recipe: Caesar Salad
Recipe_Food_Salad_Caesar.description:
[TMP] Teaches the <item is="Food_Salad_Caesar"/> recipe.

Instantly restores <color is="#ffffff">15%</color> health and grants:

 <color is="#ffffff">Health Regen III</color>
 <color is="#ffffff">Stamina Boost III</color>

Duration: <color is="#ffffff">6:00</color>

Rock_Stone_Aqua_Brick_Smooth_Half.name: Aqua Stone Brick Half Slab - Smooth

Rock_Gem_Emerald.name: Emerald
Rock_Gem_Emerald.description: The hearts of mighty Golems are often formed of these gemstones. Arcanists once sought the aid of more industrial diggers to locate rich pockets deep underground.

Test_All_Rotation.name: Prototype All Rotations
Test_All_Rotation.description: Used to test the "All" Rotation Type. Not actually a stair.

Rock_Runic_Teal_Brick_Half.name: Dark Blue Runic Brick Half Slab

Rock_Runic_Teal_Brick_Pillar_Base.name: Dark Blue Runic Brick Pillar - Base

Rock_Salt.name: Salt Block
Rock_Salt.description: Can be refined at the <item is="Bench_Cooking"/>.

Rock_Sandstone_Red_Brick_Smooth_Half.name: Red Sandstone Brick Half Slab - Smooth

Rock_Sandstone_White_Brick_Smooth_Half.name: White Sandstone Brick Half Slab - Smooth

Rubble_Aqua.description: [TMP] Can also be acquired by breaking down cobble in a <item is="Bench_Salvage"/>.

Soil_Clay_Ocean_Brick_Smooth_Half.name: Ocean Clay Brick Half Slab - Smooth

Soil_Hive_Corrupted_Brick_Smooth_Half.name: Corrupted Hive Brick Half Slab - Smooth

Tool_Fishing_Trap.name: Fishing Trap
Tool_Fishing_Trap.description: Set up above water to catch fish over time.

Tool_Growth_Potion.name: Growth Stage Potion
Tool_Growth_Potion.description: Developer tool. Left-click to decrease stage, right-click to increase stage. Works on any farming block.

Tool_Sap_Shunt.name: Sap Shunt
Tool_Sap_Shunt.description: Single-use on trees, will allow sap to accumulate slowly over time.

Tool_Trap_Bait.name: Fish Bait (Wild)
Tool_Trap_Bait.description: Use on a fishing trap to yield higher quality fish in a shorter amount of time.

Tool_Watering_Can.name: Empty Watering Can
Tool_Watering_Can.description: [TMP] Fill with water to use on crops. Watered crops grow <color is="#4ade80">2.5x</color> faster.

Tool_Capture_Crate.name: Capture Crate
Tool_Capture_Crate.description: Used to capture small animals in order to bring them back to your home.

Tool_Feedbag.name: Feed Bag
Tool_Feedbag.description: [TMP] A bag of animal feed, some animals might be lured by this.

Tool_Fertilizer.name: Fertilizer Bag
Tool_Fertilizer.description: [TMP] Used to fertilize tilled soil. Fertilized crops grow <color is="#4ade80">2x</color> faster.

Tool_Hammer_Crude.name: Crude Hammer
Tool_Hammer_Crude.description: Used to alter the appearance of structural building blocks.

Tool_Hammer_Iron.name: Iron Hammer
Tool_Hammer_Iron.description: Used to alter the appearance of structural building blocks.\n\nAn improved version of the crude hammer with greater durability.

Tool_Hatchet_Crude.name: Crude Hatchet
Tool_Hatchet_Crude.description: Effective for cutting down trees.\n\nThe Kweebecs acknowledge that some cultures require wood as a resource. As long as you avoid entering their woodlands with such a blade bared, it's unlikely they'll ever bring it up.

Tool_Hatchet_Iron.name: Iron Hatchet
Tool_Hatchet_Iron.description: Effective for cutting down trees.\n\nThe Kweebecs acknowledge that some cultures require wood as a resource. As long as you avoid entering their woodlands with such a blade bared, it's unlikely they'll ever bring it up.

Tool_Hoe_Crude.name: Crude Hoe
Tool_Hoe_Crude.description: Use to till dirt or grass.

Tool_Pickaxe_Crude.name: Crude Pickaxe
Tool_Pickaxe_Crude.description: Great at breaking stone and ore blocks.\n\nAll that stands between the Goblin Dukes and total domination of the underground regions is that they have yet to understand what this tool is.

Tool_Pickaxe_Iron.name: Iron Pickaxe
Tool_Pickaxe_Iron.description: Great at breaking stone and ore blocks.\n\nAll that stands between the Goblin Dukes and total domination of the underground regions is that they have yet to understand what this tool is.

Tool_Repair_Kit_Crude.name: Crude Repair Kit
Tool_Repair_Kit_Crude.description: Used to repair tools, weapons and armor. The repaired item will lose up to 20% of its maximum durability.

Tool_Repair_Kit_Iron.name: Repair Kit
Tool_Repair_Kit_Iron.description: Used to repair tools, weapons, and armor. Repaired items will lose up to 10% of their maximum durability.

Tool_Shears_Basic.name: Crude Shears
Tool_Shears_Basic.description: Can be used to shear sheep and harvest various foliage.

Tool_Shovel_Crude.name: Crude Shovel
Tool_Shovel_Crude.description: Breaks multiple blocks of dirt simultaneously.

Tool_Sickle_Crude.name: Crude Sickle
Tool_Sickle_Crude.description: Can be used to harvest multiple crops in a single swing.

Utility_Bag_Seed.name: Seed Bag
Utility_Bag_Seed.description: Experimental container, use at your own risk.

Weapon_Sword_Crude.name: Crude Sword
Weapon_Sword_Crude.description: Even during the age of heroes, the fashioning of one's first weapons from crude materials was a rite of passage on the road to becoming an adventurer.
